about_the_game:
Visual Novel Music Vol 2 is jam packed with triumphant, melodic, professionally produced music to enhance your Visual Novel stories! Featuring music covering a vast array of scenarios and moods, and produced with a wide palette of instrumentation to fit the mood perfectly of each track, your Visual Novels will come to life with this exciting new pack!

Features:

25 BGM tracks
Music for Fanfares, morning, evening, afternoon, anger, happiness, tension, endings and more!
.m4a / .ogg file formats are included.
For use in Visual Novel Maker, RPG Makers or the engine of your choice

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
